name: UITextDraggable
desc: The interface that determines if a text view is a drag source.

items.name: var isTextDragActive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether at least one drag session for the text view is active.

items.name: var textDragInteraction: UIDragInteraction?
items.desc: The drag interaction object added by UIKit to the text view.

items.name: var textDragDelegate: UITextDragDelegate?
items.desc: A text drag delegate object for customizing the drag source behavior of a text view.

items.name: var textDragOptions: UITextDragOptions
items.desc: The options for the text drag operation.
